<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">6d358ca11fa9d610ff7bedd455740d68</macroponent><name>Interactive Data filter</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    try{
        var clickedFilter = event.payload.params.query
        console.log(clickedFilter)
        api.setState('filter',clickedFilter)
    }catch(err){
        console.log("error")
        console.log(err)
    }


}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>manager_dashboard</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-12-09 09:42:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>ffd6ffaa53d61210c9241ab0a0490ece</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Interactive Data filter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ePOs" source="x_1097202_epos">cee28b2783e01210aaa27e95eeaad3ff</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ePOs">cee28b2783e01210aaa27e95eeaad3ff</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ffd6ffaa53d61210c9241ab0a0490ece</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>manager_dashboard</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-09 09:42:24</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
